Auckland Transport introduces weekly $50 public transport fare caps https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-introduces-weekly-50-public-transport-fare-caps/BY43GSU3XZCWTEXR5CKQDYEP7E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-introduces-weekly-50-public-transport-fare-caps/BY43GSU3XZCWTEXR5CKQDYEP7E/ AT users will be charged a maximum $50 a week, regardless of how often they use services. Sun, 21 Jul 2024 00:51:50 +0000 From Sunday, a price cap means Auckland Transport users will be charged a maximum $50 a week, regardless of how often they use services. Photo / Michael Craig
Search ended for group missing after getting trapped on rocks at Cape Reinga https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/search-ending-for-group-missing-after-getting-trapped-on-rocks-at-cape-reinga/LQNUQE7BYRHGHBTDJB4OOKK5FE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/search-ending-for-group-missing-after-getting-trapped-on-rocks-at-cape-reinga/LQNUQE7BYRHGHBTDJB4OOKK5FE/ Yolisa TswanyaEmergency services have successfully rescued a small group at Cape Reinga. Sun, 21 Jul 2024 00:35:17 +0000 Emergency services, including the Police Search and Rescue team and a helicopter, managed to a group that came into trouble on the rocks at Cape Reinga. Photo / NZME

Grandparent wins fight for paid parental leave after unexpectedly becoming carer of infant https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/grandparent-wins-fight-for-paid-parental-leave-after-unexpectedly-becoming-carer-of-infant/Y2FO4ELQNFF7ZK3XQDZSVESSGA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/grandparent-wins-fight-for-paid-parental-leave-after-unexpectedly-becoming-carer-of-infant/Y2FO4ELQNFF7ZK3XQDZSVESSGA/ Tara ShaskeyThe grandparent's application was declined after returning to work to complete a handover. Sun, 21 Jul 2024 00:00:00 +0000 A grandparent who suddenly became the carer of their infant grandchild has had to fight for paid parental leave payments.

Thunderstorm warning in Northland, as speed limit remains on SH1 at Brynderwyns https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/temporary-30kmh-speed-limit-in-place-for-sh1-through-northlands-brynderwyn-hills/5ZCSY37J5FGA5B6BEXKNBWKJXM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/temporary-30kmh-speed-limit-in-place-for-sh1-through-northlands-brynderwyn-hills/5ZCSY37J5FGA5B6BEXKNBWKJXM/ SH1 is open at the Brynderwyns but more thunderstorms are on their way. Sat, 20 Jul 2024 23:18:48 +0000 A slip closed State Highway 1 at the Brynderwyn Hills on Saturday, less than a month after it was reopened. The road reopened later on Saturday.
Two people seriously injured following reported Christchurch Central assault https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-people-seriously-injured-following-reported-christchurch-central-assault/5RO33Q4PCBDOFAVU3IYBIEPEMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-people-seriously-injured-following-reported-christchurch-central-assault/5RO33Q4PCBDOFAVU3IYBIEPEMA/ Emergency services were called to the scene around 4.10am. Sat, 20 Jul 2024 22:40:30 +0000 Police were called to an alleged assault in central Christchurch where two people were left in a serious condition.
